verbose_text: These researchers showed that exposure to hypercapnia (7.5% and 15% CO 2) for the longer duration of 6 days than that in our study (48 hours) under normoxic conditions decreased proliferation of A549 alveolar epithelial cells and N12 lung fibroblasts by inducing microRNA-183, which downregulated isocitrate dehydrogenase-2, a key enzyme of the TCA cycle.
evidence: duration of 6 days than that in our study (48 hours) under normoxic conditions decreased proliferation
